comments.text: Markiplier and Jacksepticeye are the two reasons I started youtube.  I was lucky enough to discover them both when they were small youtubers, and it was watching their channels grow that made me think that even I could do it. It's so slow, and not getting views or subs can really be disheartening. But I know that if I keep going the direction I want to go, then I can get there.

comments.text: I just hit 7000 subscribers and honestly the motivation has been insane. Seeing my channel grow hundreds of subscribers JUST THIS MONTH has been insanely motivating. I definitely attribute it to posting frequently and making sure the content is on point. But man.....these videos just make me want to give back to the world you know ? Thanks for brightening my day more and more and to whoever is reading, be yourself, have fun and do what you love. If you love what you do, it will grow into something great. Thanks for this video...stay blessed everyone.
